verses.translation: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh[1],
secure in their winter and summer journeys[2].
Let them worship the Lord of this [Sacred] House[3],

verses.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
verses.translation: Who fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear[4].
